text: mishranavaadee avashy kahengeh yadi allaah chaahata, to ham tatha hamaare poorvaj (allaah ka) saajhee na banaate aur na kuchh haî€¼raam (varjit) karate. isee prakaar, inase poorv ke logon ne (rasoolon ko) jhuthalaaya tha, yahaan tak ki hamaaree yaatana ka svaad chakh liya. (he nabee!) unase poochhiye ki kya tumhaare paas (is vishay mein) koee gyaan hai, jise tum hamaare samaksh prastut kar sako? tum to keval anumaan par chalate ho aur keval aankalan kar rahe ho
